36.ara-name: كتاب الزهد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hazin narrated that Sahl bin Sa'd asked:"Did the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) eat Naqi – meaning refined (flour)?” So Sahl said: “The Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) did not see Naqi until he met Allah.” It was said to him: “Did you have sifters during the time of the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w)?” He said: “There were no sifters for us.” They said: “How did you prepare the barley?”He said: “We would blow it so (the husk) would fly off of it, then we would add water so we could knead it.” (Hasan)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَعِيشَةِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَأَهْلِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Subsistence of the Prophet (ﷺ) And His Family
